# isLeapMonth

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the month is a leap month.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLeapMonth: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the month is a leap month, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Accessing Years and Months

- **era**: The number of eras.
- **year**: The number of years.
- **yearForWeekOfYear**: The ISO 8601 week-numbering year.
- **quarter**: The number of quarters.
- **month**: The number of months.
title: isLeapMonth
